intro: Ziziphus divaricata, commonly known as the African date palm, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to southern Africa. Ziziphus divaricata is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, making it a resilient species in harsh climates. Its botanical features make it an important plant for both ecological and cultural purposes in its native region.
